verses.text: Then \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* her mother in \w law|strong="H2545"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, My \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, shall I not \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w rest|strong="H4494"\w* for thee, that it may be \w well|strong="H3190"\w* with thee?

And now \add is\add* not \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* of our \w kindred|strong="H4130"\w*, with whose \w maidens|strong="H5291"\w* thou wast? Behold, he \w winnoweth|strong="H2219"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* to \w night|strong="H3915"\w* in the \w threshingfloor|strong="H1637"\w*.

\w Wash|strong="H7364"\w* thyself therefore, and \w anoint|strong="H5480"\w* thee, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w raiment|strong="H8071"\w* upon thee, and get thee \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w floor|strong="H1637"\w*: \add but\add* make not thyself \w known|strong="H3045"\w* unto the \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, until he shall have \w done|strong="H3615"\w* \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w*.

And it shall be, when he lieth \w down|strong="H7901"\w*, that thou shalt \w mark|strong="H3045"\w* the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where he shall \w lie|strong="H7901"\w*, and thou shalt go \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* his \w feet|strong="H4772"\w*, and lay thee \w down|strong="H7901"\w*; and he will \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thee what thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.\f + \fr 3.4 \ft uncover: or, lift up the clothes that are on\f*
And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, All that thou \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w* unto me I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.
¶ And she went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* unto the \w floor|strong="H1637"\w*, and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that her mother in \w law|strong="H2545"\w* \w bade|strong="H6680"\w* her.

And when \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* had \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w*, and his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* was \w merry|strong="H3190"\w*, he \w went|strong="H0935"\w* to lie \w down|strong="H7901"\w* at the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the heap of \w corn|strong="H6194"\w*: and she \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w softly|strong="H3909"\w*, and \w uncovered|strong="H1540"\w* his \w feet|strong="H4772"\w*, and laid her \w down|strong="H7901"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass at \w midnight|strong="H2677"\w*, that the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* was \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*, and \w turned|strong="H3943"\w* himself: and, behold, a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* at his \w feet|strong="H4772"\w*.\f + \fr 3.8 \ft turned: or, took hold on\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add art\add* thou? And she \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*: \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* therefore thy \w skirt|strong="H3671"\w* over thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*; for thou \add art\add* a near \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w*.\f + \fr 3.9 \ft a near…: or, one that hath right to redeem\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* thou of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, my \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*: \add for\add* thou hast \w shewed|strong="H3190"\w* more \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* in the latter \w end|strong="H0314"\w* than at the \w beginning|strong="H7223"\w*, inasmuch as thou \w followedst|strong="H3212"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* young \w men|strong="H0970"\w*, whether \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* or \w rich|strong="H6223"\w*.

And now, my \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not; I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to thee all that thou \w requirest|strong="H0559"\w*: for all the \w city|strong="H8179"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* doth \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that thou \add art\add* a \w virtuous|strong="H2428"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*.\f + \fr 3.11 \ft city: Heb. gate\f*

And now it is \w true|strong="H0551"\w* that I \add am thy\add* near \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w*: howbeit there \w is|strong="H3426"\w* a \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w* \w nearer|strong="H7138"\w* than I.

\w Tarry|strong="H3885"\w* this \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and it shall be in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \add that\add* if he will perform unto thee the part of a \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w*, \w well|strong="H2896"\w*; let him do the \w kinsman’s part|strong="H1350"\w*: but if he \w will|strong="H2654"\w* not do the part of a \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w* to thee, then will I do the part of a \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w* to thee, \add as\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*: lie \w down|strong="H7901"\w* until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

¶ And she \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* at his \w feet|strong="H4772"\w* until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*: and she rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w before|strong="H2958"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* could \w know|strong="H5234"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let it not be \w known|strong="H3045"\w* that a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w floor|strong="H1637"\w*.

Also he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Bring|strong="H3051"\w* the \w vail|strong="H4304"\w* that \add thou hast\add* upon thee, and \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* it. And when she \w held|strong="H0270"\w* it, he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \add measures\add* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H7896"\w* \add it\add* on her: and she \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 3.15 \ft vail: or, sheet, or, apron\f*

And when she \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to her mother in \w law|strong="H2545"\w*, she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add art\add* thou, my \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*? And she \w told|strong="H5046"\w* her all that the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to her.

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, These \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \add measures\add* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* he me; for he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to me, \w Go|strong="H0935"\w* not \w empty|strong="H7387"\w* unto thy mother in \w law|strong="H2545"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* she, Sit \w still|strong="H3427"\w*, my \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, until thou \w know|strong="H3045"\w* how the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* will \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*: for the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* will not be in \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*, \w until|strong="H0518"\w* he have \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
